question: Pop Culture - Which animated movie features a panda who becomes the Dragon Warrior? (1 流行文化 - 哪部动画电影讲述了一只熊猫成为龙战士的故事？)

question: Pop Culture - Which Disney film about a Colombian family includes the song “We Don’t Talk About Bruno”? (4 流行文化 - 哪部迪士尼电影讲述了哥伦比亚家庭的故事，并包含歌曲《我们不谈论布鲁诺》？)

question: Chinese Culture - The concept of “yin and yang” describes: (23 中国文化 - “阴阳”概念描述的是：)
